name: Java-chronicle
body:
# Chronicle Persisted low latency logging and IPC messaging It is available on maven central as 
<dependency>
    <groupId>net.openhft</groupId>
    <artifactId>chronicle</artifactId>
    <version>2.0.3</version>
</dependency>
For working examples, have a look at the unit tests and demo module. ## JavaDoc Check out our documentation at [JavaDoc] (http://openhft.github.io/Java-Chronicle/apidocs/) --- [Chronicle Wiki](https://github.com/OpenHFT/Java-Chronicle/wiki) [Java Chronicle support group](https://groups.google.com/forum/?hl=en-GB#!forum/java-chronicle) [Chronicle support on Stackoverflow](http://stackoverflow.com/tags/chronicle/info) [Forum for those learning about OpenHFT](https://groups.google.com/forum/?hl=en-GB#!forum/open-hft)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
